text: Tsuru is the Japanese word for crane. It may refer to: *Tsuru (name), a Japanese name *Tsuru, Yamanashi, a city in Japan **Tsuru University, located in the city *Tsuru Shima, a uninhabited island in Okayama Prefecture, Japan *Nissan Sentra, a car formerly marketed in Mexico as the Tsuru ==See also== *Tsurui, a village in Hokkaido
title: Tsuru
